greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of Product_{k>=1} (1 + k*x^(k^2))^k.
link: Vaclav Kotesovec, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
mathematica: nmax = 100; s = 1 + x; Do[s *= Sum[Binomial[k, j]*k^j*x^(j*k^2), {j, 0, Floor[nmax/k^2] + 1}]; s = Select[Expand[s], Exponent[#, x] <= nmax &];, {k, 2, nmax}]; CoefficientList[s, x]
results.author: _Vaclav Kotesovec_, Apr 15 2017
